property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the XMLExportPreference &#40;a Application or Document).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: viewAfterExport
property.shortdesc: If true, displays exported XML content in a specified viewer.

property.name: preferredBrowser
property.shortdesc: The preferred browser for viewing XML. Can return: File or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: exportFromSelected
property.shortdesc: If true, exports XML content from the selected XML element. If false, exports the entire document.

property.name: fileEncoding
property.shortdesc: The file encoding type for exporting XML content.

property.name: ruby
property.shortdesc: If true, includes Ruby text in the exported XML content.

property.name: excludeDtd
property.shortdesc: If true, excludes the DTD from the exported XML content.

property.name: copyOriginalImages
property.shortdesc: If true, copies original images to the images subfolder.

property.name: copyOptimizedImages
property.shortdesc: If true, copies optimized images to the images subfolder.

property.name: copyFormattedImages
property.shortdesc: If true, copies formatted images to the images subfolder.

property.name: imageConversion
property.shortdesc: The file format to use for converted images. Note: Valid only when copy optimized images and/or copy formatted images is true.

property.name: gifOptionsPalette
property.shortdesc: The color palette for GIF conversion. Note: Not valid when image conversion is JPEG.

property.name: gifOptionsInterlaced
property.shortdesc: If true, generates interlaced GIFs. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is JPEG.

property.name: jpegOptionsQuality
property.shortdesc: The quality of converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid when image conversion is GIF.

property.name: jpegOptionsFormat
property.shortdesc: The formatting method for converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is GIF.

property.name: allowTransform
property.shortdesc: If true, transforms the XML using an XSLT file.

property.name: transformFilename
property.shortdesc: The name of the XSLT file. Note: Valid when allow transform is true. Can return: File or XMLTransformFile enumerator.

property.name: characterReferences
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces special characters with character references.

property.name: exportUntaggedTablesFormat
property.shortdesc: The export format for untagged tables in tagged stories.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLExportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
